goals.title: Setup Project Structure
goals.description: Initialize the project with basic folder structure and configuration files
goals.documentation:
# Setup Project Structure

## Objective
Create a well-organized project structure that follows best practices.

## Key Points
- Use clear folder naming conventions
- Separate concerns (src, tests, config)
- Include necessary configuration files

## Resources
- Follow the project template guidelines
- Use industry-standard folder structures

## Expected Outcome
A clean project structure ready for development with all necessary configuration files in place.

tasks.description: Create src, tests, and config folders

goals.title: Implement Core Functionality
goals.description: Build the main features of the application
goals.documentation:
# Implement Core Functionality

## Objective
Develop the primary features that deliver value to users.

## Key Points
- Write clean, maintainable code
- Follow SOLID principles
- Add appropriate error handling
- Use TypeScript for type safety

## Testing
- Write unit tests for each function
- Ensure edge cases are covered
- Aim for >80% code coverage

## Code Quality
- Use meaningful variable names
- Add comments for complex logic
- Keep functions small and focused

tasks.description: Implement main business logic with proper TypeScript types
Add comprehensive error handling and input validation
Write unit tests with Jest covering all main functions

goals.title: API Integration
goals.description: Connect to external APIs and handle data fetching
goals.documentation:
# API Integration

## Objective
Implement robust API integration with proper error handling and data transformation.

## Requirements
- Use axios or fetch for HTTP requests
- Implement retry logic for failed requests
- Add request/response interceptors
- Handle different HTTP status codes

## Security
- Never commit API keys
- Use environment variables
- Implement rate limiting

## Data Handling
- Validate API responses
- Transform data to match internal types
- Cache responses when appropriate

tasks.description: Create API client with axios and configure base URL and headers
Implement request/response interceptors for authentication and error handling
Add retry logic for failed requests with exponential backoff
Create TypeScript interfaces for API responses and transform data

goals.title: User Interface Development
goals.description: Create responsive and accessible UI components
goals.documentation:
# User Interface Development

## Objective
Build a modern, responsive, and accessible user interface.

## Design Principles
- Mobile-first approach
- Consistent spacing and typography
- Accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant)
- Performance optimized

## Component Structure
- Create reusable components
- Use composition over inheritance
- Implement proper prop types
- Add loading and error states

## Styling
- Use CSS modules or styled-components
- Follow BEM or similar methodology
- Implement dark mode support
- Ensure responsive breakpoints

tasks.description: Create base component library with Button, Input, and Card components
Implement responsive layout with CSS Grid/Flexbox
Add accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
Implement dark mode with theme context

goals.title: Testing and Documentation
goals.description: Ensure code quality through comprehensive testing and documentation
goals.documentation:
# Testing and Documentation

## Objective
Achieve high test coverage and create comprehensive documentation.

## Testing Strategy
- Unit tests for individual functions
- Integration tests for API calls
- E2E tests for critical user flows
- Visual regression tests for UI

## Documentation Requirements
- JSDoc comments for all public functions
- README with setup instructions
- API documentation
- Contributing guidelines

## Quality Metrics
- Minimum 80% code coverage
- All tests passing in CI/CD
- No critical security vulnerabilities
- Performance benchmarks met

tasks.description: Write comprehensive unit tests achieving >80% coverage
Add integration tests for API endpoints
Create JSDoc comments for all public functions and interfaces
Write comprehensive README with examples and troubleshooting
